description:
Everybody is out for a jog when they run into Goro. He takes this opportunity to spend time with Chizuru while Takeru and Eiko show Squid Girl around the city. Sanae has become a bodyguard to Squid Girl.  Is this a new ruse to get closer? What trouble will Mini-Squid Girl get into now?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gehst du nicht Joggen? / Ist das kein Special Agent? / Machst du keinen Ausflug?
Jogging Shinaika!? / SP ja Naika!? / Bouken Shinaika!?
Si on faisait du jogging ? / Des gardes du corps ? / Si nous partions à l’aventure ?
Won`t You Jog!? / Isn`t That an SP!? / Won`t You Take a Trip!?
ジョギングしなイカ!? / SPじゃなイカ!? / 冒険しなイカ!?
